sentences.english: Thus began the Later Tang Dynasty—the first in a long line of conquest dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 因此开始了后唐，中的第一个长长的征服王朝。

sentences.english: Field in the days to TangLi called field in days sound dad.
sentences.chinese: 田在天同意后唐力叫了田在天一声爸。
